title: Slayer Equipment (shop)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Slayer Equipment shops are run by Slayer masters. They consist of various tools and weapons for use against Slayer monsters.

content:
This article is about about the slayer equipment shop operated by Slayer Masters. For information about the various tools and weapons used when fighting Slayer monsters, see slayer equipment.
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Slayer Equipment (shop)

Slayer Equipment shops are run by Slayer masters. They consist of various tools and weapons for use against Slayer monsters.

All shops share the same stock.

Items required for the player's current Slayer task are highlighted in the shop interface.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Stock
    • 2.1 A Porcine of Interest
  • 3 Changes

A Porcine of Interest[edit | edit source]

Upon completion of the A Porcine of Interest quest, the shop will begin to carry reinforced goggles.

ItemNumber
in stock		Restock
time		Price

bought at		GE
price
Reinforced goggles500.6s 100N/ANot sold

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 April 2020
(update)

With the reintroduction of Bounty Hunter, Slayer masters once again no longer sell the rune pouch for coins.

27 January 2020
(update)

Slayer masters now again temporarily sell the rune pouch for 1,200,000 (to non-Ironmen only) due to Bounty Hunter being temporarily disabled.

7 November 2019
(update | poll)

Slayer masters no longer sell the rune pouch for coins, and the slayer reward points cost has been reduced from 1,250 to 750.

24 October 2019
(update)

Slayer masters now temporarily sell the rune pouch for 1,500,000 (to non-Ironmen only) due to upcoming Bounty Hunter changes.

4 April 2013
(update)

There is no longer an infinite stock of certain slayer items.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.
